title: Compulsion
description: When rent boy Seymour meets his new client, the sexually depraved Cole, things will never be the same again. Seymour isn't even the right sex. Cole wanted a woman that night but resorted to a man out of desperation and soon things are spinning wildly out of control.Cole's an addict - a man who spends vast amounts of money on pornography and prostitutes and still craves more, twenty-four seven. Soon he's introducing Seymour to a world of excess beyond anything he's ever known...Book One in the Addiction series.
author: Scarlet Blackwell
